General.Name: Clearside Biomedical Inc
General.Description: Clearside Biomedical, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the revolutionizing the delivery of therapies to the back of the eye through the suprachoroidal space. The company offers XIPERE, a triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension for the treatment of macular edema associated with uveitis. It also develops CLS-AX, an axitinib injectable suspension for suprachoroidal injection, which has completed Phase 2 clinical trial to treat wet AMD. The company has a collaboration with bausch + lomb ireland limited, Arctic Vision (Hong Kong) Limited, REGENXBIO, Inc., BioCryst Pharmaceuticals, Inc., and Aura Biosciences, Inc. Clearside Biomedical, Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Alpharetta, Georgia.
General.Address: 900 North Point Parkway, Alpharetta, GA, United States, 30005
